channel.title: Authoring Events on Scott Larson
channel.description: Recent content in Authoring Events on Scott Larson

item.title: Scott Officially Launches His New Book "Most Improved" at the Redwood Writers 2019 Author Launch
item.description: Scott the Computer Repair & Data Recovery Troubleshooter is launching his new book “Most Improved” A book on recovering from depression and finding new purpose. Are you a aspiring writer, a writer yourself, or are you interested in checking out new books written by local authors? Join us at this Redwood Writers Group event, open to the public at the Flamingo Hotel on 2777 Fourth St. Santa Rosa, July 14, 2-4:30 PM.
